title: Vue Built-in Elements

metadata.description: Learn about Vue Built-in Elements with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Vue has a set of built-in elements.
Element
Description
<component>
Creates a dynamic component
<slot>
Creates a slot where the child component can receive content from the parent
<template>
Creates a placeholder for content without being rendered itself

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers Vue Built-in Elements concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Vue Built-in Elements effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Vue Built-in Elements and how to apply it in your projects.
